title: snowday map kills my game man
body:
High end computer, great GTX graphics card but holy jesus the christmas snow map just slaughters my frames, i go from my normal 120 to about 20
The map should honestly be optional rather than there you go, screw you

replies.body:
I'm not certain this is directly caused by the Snowdown map. There have been some batches of Windows 10 updates that have been re-enabling the Windows Game Bar, which causes tons of issues in League for your FPS and stability. I'd recommend [**ensuring this feature is disabled**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) in case it was causing your problems.

Let me know if this helped.
